creator: hjohnson@bmc.com
text:
Trying to disable SSL-V3 to get around the POODLE SSL-V3 security vulnerability.  The recommended steps do not seem to have the desired effect.

1. Stop httpd service

2. Add the following line in the httpd-ssl.conf file in the "SSL Cipher Suite" section:

SSLProtocol all -SSLv2 -SSLv3

3. Restart httpd service

Expected Result: SSL-V3 should no longer appear when running nmap security scan against the Apache server

Actual Result:  SSL-V3 continues to show up, e.g., 

Nmap scan report for <host name witheld> (123.45.67.89)
Host is up (0.0065s latency).
Not shown: 983 closed ports
PORT      STATE SERVICE
80/tcp    open  http
135/tcp   open  msrpc
139/tcp   open  netbios-ssn
443/tcp   open  https
| ssl-enum-ciphers:
|_  SSLv3: No supported ciphers found
445/tcp   open  microsoft-ds
1099/tcp  open  rmiregistry
1100/tcp  open  mctp
2010/tcp  open  search
3389/tcp  open  ms-wbt-server
5001/tcp  open  commplex-link
8008/tcp  open  http
8081/tcp  open  blackice-icecap
8082/tcp  open  blackice-alerts
8093/tcp  open  unknown
49152/tcp open  unknown
49153/tcp open  unknown
49154/tcp open  unknown
Nothing there shows SSLv3 was supported after you disabled it.
creator: covener@gmail.com

text:
Apologies - we had mis-interpreted the nmap output.  The feature is working as expected.  Closing this bug.

Including for reference a sample nmap output where SSLV3 *is* supported:

Nmap scan report for 123.45.67.89
Host is up (0.019s latency).
PORT    STATE SERVICE
443/tcp open  https
| ssl-enum-ciphers:
|   SSLv3:
|     ciphers:
|       TLS_DHE_RSA_WITH_3DES_EDE_CBC_SHA - strong
|       TLS_DHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA - strong
|       TLS_DHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_CBC_SHA - strong
|       TLS_RSA_WITH_3DES_EDE_CBC_SHA - strong
|       TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA - strong
|       TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_256_CBC_SHA - strong
|       TLS_RSA_WITH_RC4_128_SHA - strong
|     compressors:
|       NULL
|   TLSv1.0:
|     ciphers:
|       TLS_DHE_RSA_WITH_3DES_EDE_CBC_SHA - strong
|       TLS_DHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA - strong
|       TLS_DHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_CBC_SHA - strong
|       TLS_RSA_WITH_3DES_EDE_CBC_SHA - strong
|       TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA - strong
|       TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_256_CBC_SHA - strong
|       TLS_RSA_WITH_RC4_128_SHA - strong
|     compressors:
|       NULL
|_  least strength: strong
creator: hjohnson@bmc.com
